response.overview: Failed architect, engineer and vicious murderer Jack narrates the details of some of his most elaborately orchestrated crimes, each of them a towering piece of art that defines his life's work as a serial killer for twelve years.
response.tagline: If you feel like screaming... you definitely should.
response.title: The House That Jack Built

titles.title: ハウス・ジャック・ビルト：2018
